resources.string: "The issue you're facing is because you're trying to use the method setOnQueryTextListener on a SearchBar widget instead of a SearchView.The SearchBar widget doesn't have the setOnQueryTextListener method; it's only available in SearchView. To fix this, you can either replace your SearchBar with a SearchView or handle the SearchBar interactions differently. To fix this, you can either replace your SearchBar with a SearchView or handle the SearchBar interactions differently. To fix this, you can either replace your SearchBar with a SearchView or handle the SearchBar interactions differently. If you want to stick with SearchView, make sure your layout XML has a SearchView widget, and you use that in your code."
